enumerator.Name: Hardware
enumerator.Description: Hardware CSL implementation, using the standard CamX KMD and hardware

enumerator.Name: IFH
enumerator.Description: Infinitely Fast Hardware CSL implementation, bypassing the KMD

enum.Name: EnableAFAlgoType
enum.Description: List of HAF algorithm that can be enabled overriding tuning

enumerator.Name: Disabled
enumerator.Description: AF algorithm tuning override is disabled

enumerator.Name: PDAF
enumerator.Description: Override tuning and enable only PDAF

enumerator.Name: TOF
enumerator.Description: Override tuning and enable only TOF

enumerator.Name: DCIAF
enumerator.Description: Override tuning and enable only DCIAF

enumerator.Name: CAF
enumerator.Description: Override tuning and enable only CAF

enumerator.Name: InfinityToMacro
enumerator.Description: Performs fullsweep starting from Infinity to Macro

enumerator.Name: MacroToInfinity
enumerator.Description: Performs fullsweep starting from Macro to Infinity

enumerator.Name: BothDirection
enumerator.Description: Performs fullsweep starting from Infinity to Macro and back

enum.Name: AFManualLensControlType
enum.Description: Enumerates type of AF manual lens control

enumerator.Name: DAC
enumerator.Description: Move lens manually using DAC value

enumerator.Name: Logical
enumerator.Description: Move lens manually giving logical lens position

enum.Name: MultiCamera3ASyncType
enum.Description: Enumerates type of multi camera 3A sync scheme

enumerator.Name: Singleton
enumerator.Description: 3A sync solution with only one algorithm instance

enum.Name: MultiCameraHWSyncType
enum.Description: Used as a mask to enable the HW Sync

enumerator.Name: RTB
enumerator.Description: Enable the HW Sync for RTB usecase

enumerator.Name: SAT
enumerator.Description: Enable the HW Sync for SAT usecase

enumerator.Name: VR
enumerator.Description: Enable the HW Sync for VR usecase

enumerator.Name: AppRequest
enumerator.Description: Enable/Disable FD processing based on App request

enum.Name: FDMultiCamProcessingType
enum.Description: Processing criteria in multi-cam when both running

enumerator.Name: ProcessMasterOnly
enumerator.Description: Process only master requests at full fps

enumerator.Name: ProcessAuxOnly
enumerator.Description: Process only aux requests at full fps

enumerator.Name: ProcessBoth
enumerator.Description: Process both master and aux at half fps

enumerator.Name: FD_DL_DSP_and_Standard_ARM
enumerator.Description: Use FD_DL_DSP and supplement with FD_Standard_ARM when certain conditions are met

enumerator.Name: FDHWHybrid
enumerator.Description: Use FD HW as FD Client

enumerator.Name: FDSWOnly
enumerator.Description: Use FD SW as FD Client

enumerator.Name: FDDLDSP
enumerator.Description: Use FD DL as FD Client

enum.Name: FDThreadTaskAllocationType
enum.Description: Enumerates FD thread task allocation types

enumerator.Name: PTDOnPriThread
enumerator.Description: Run PTD on the primary worker thread of FD Manager Node

enumerator.Name: PTDOnSecThread
enumerator.Description: Run PTD on the secondary worker thread of FD Manager Node

enum.Name: ImageDumpType
enum.Description: Used as a mask to enable image dumps for specific nodes

enumerator.Name: JPEG
enumerator.Description: All JPEG output ports for all JPEG nodes

enumerator.Name: ChiNode
enumerator.Description: All output ports for all ChiNodes

enumerator.Name: Misc
enumerator.Description: All other nodes not explicitly listed above

enumerator.Name: DualLEDCalibrationTuning
enumerator.Description: Dual LED is being tuned for the golden module

enumerator.Name: CHIPartialDataDisable
enumerator.Description: CHI Partial Data will be disabled

enumerator.Name: CHIPartialDataSeparate
enumerator.Description: CHI Partial Data will be sent separately

enumerator.Name: CHIPartialDataCombined
enumerator.Description: CHI Partial Data will be sent along with Core Partial Data

setting.Name: Output Format
setting.Help: Output format for IPE Preview and Video output

setting.Name: Output Format
setting.Help: Output format for IPE Ref port output

setting.Name: Enable Stride Setting
setting.Help: Use the Stride Configuration data provided by OEM

setting.Name: Number of Metadata Results
setting.Help: Max number of metadata results supported. Value > 1 means partial metadata results are enabled. 2 is the max value supported

setting.Name: Max HAL Requests
setting.Help: Max HAL requests the driver accepts before queueing.

setting.Name: Wait all results timeout
setting.Help: Timeout value when waiting for all results

setting.Name: Cache Enable for EGL Buffers
setting.Help: Enables/Disable EGL Buffers Cache

setting.Name: Number of HAL worker threads
setting.Help: The number of threads to use in the device's threadpool

setting.Name: Enable CHI Override
setting.Help: Enable/Disable CHI Override path

setting.Name: Enable Multi Camera
setting.Help: Enable/Disable multi camera framework with Back Aux camera

setting.Name: Enable Physical Camera Jpeg
setting.Help: Enable/Disable JPEG Capture per Physical Camera

setting.Name: Enable Multi Camera with front
setting.Help: Enable/Disable multi camera framework with Front Main camera

setting.Name: Enable Multi Camera with VR
setting.Help: Enable/Disable multi camera framework with VR

setting.Name: Multi Camera Sensor Hardware Sync Mask
setting.Help: Will limit enable HW sync to only the specified usecase Uses MultiCameraHWSyncType to define the flags Disabled = 0x0 Enable HW Sync for RTB = 0x1 Enable HW Sync for SAT = 0x2 Enable HW Sync for VR = 0x4

setting.Name: Enable Multi Camera Kernel/Software Frame Sync
setting.Help: Enable/Disable multi camera framework kernel frame sync. This will help to apply both the real time request settings as close as possible. 0 for disable, 1 for enable. This works only if multiCameraEnable is set.

setting.Name: Multi camera fps match
setting.Help: Enable/Disable multi camera fps match

setting.Name: Multi Camera 3A sync scheme
setting.Help: Select 3A sync scheme Disabled: No 3A sync QTI: QTI standard 3A sync solution Singleton: 3A sync solution with only one algorithm instance

setting.Name: AE Lock Frames during HW Sync Start
setting.Help: Number of Frames where AE is locked for HW sync to latch on

setting.Name: Export secure camera
setting.Help: Export the secure camera for IR camera application

setting.Name: Enable RAW
setting.Help: Enables/Disables RAW Processing

setting.Name: Max RAW sizes exposed to App
setting.Help: Max RAW sizes exposed in static capability to APP and minimum should be 1

setting.Name: Enable Internal HAL Pixel Stream Configuration
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Internal HAL Pixel Stream Configuration

setting.Name: Enable NCS service as part of the pipeline
setting.Help: Enables/Disable NCS service

setting.Name: Cap minimum reprocess input width exposed to Frameworks
setting.Help: Cap minimum reprocess width of input dimension supported by HAL. By default all sizes upto 5MP(2592x1944) will be advertised. Default value of this is 2592

setting.Name: Cap minimum reprocess input height exposed to Frameworks
setting.Help: Cap minimum reprocess height of input dimension supported by HAL. By default all sizes upto 5MP(2592x1944) will be advertised. Default value of this is 1944

setting.Name: Minimum input output resolution
setting.Help: Minimum input output resolution for stream configuration Default value is 0MP

setting.Name: Maximum input output resolution
setting.Help: Maximum input output resolution for stream configuration Default value is 200MP

setting.Name: Enable TOF interface as part of the pipeline
setting.Help: Enables/Disable TOF interface

setting.Name: Enable Thermal mitigation
setting.Help: Enables/Disable thermal mitigation

setting.Name: Cap number of max_buffers for secure camera usecase
setting.Help: Limits max_buffers of producer for secure camera usecase

setting.Name: Enable Native HEIF
setting.Help: Enable/Disable native HEIF

setting.Name: Induce additional sleep in ms in chi nodes
setting.Help: Induce additional sleep in millisecond in chi nodes in offline pipeline. Induce sleep time more than 500 milliseconds for adversial test.

setting.Name: Enable HAL format override
setting.Help: Enable/Disable HAL format override

setting.Name: Max number of accepted errors
setting.Help: Limit the max number of duplicate result or notification related errors accepted

setting.Name: Enable Resource Manager
setting.Help: Enable/Disable CamX Resource Manager

setting.Name: Enable PSM stream crop
setting.Help: Enable/Disable zoom to use PSM stream crop info

setting.Name: BPS Realtime Sensor ID
setting.Help: Sensor ID for BPS Based Realtime Camera

setting.Name: Enable BLM client
setting.Help: Enables/Disable Bandwidth Limits Manager Client

setting.Name: Enable Screen Grab
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Screengrab, Use video stream for live snapshots

setting.Name: Assert mask
setting.Help: Mask of asserts which will trigger the runtime assert code

setting.Name: Warning log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which warning logs are output

setting.Name: Entry/Exit log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which entry/exit logs are output

setting.Name: Config log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which config logs are output

setting.Name: Dump log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which Dump logs are output

setting.Name: Info log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which info logs are output

setting.Name: Perf info log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which perf info logs are output

setting.Name: Verbose log mask
setting.Help: Mask of which verbose logs are output

setting.Name: DRQ log enable
setting.Help: Enable DRQ logging

setting.Name: Metadata log enable
setting.Help: Enable Metadata logging

setting.Name: Enable Request Mapping Logs
setting.Help: Write request mappings to the log

setting.Name: Error trace enable
setting.Help: Enable error logging in trace logs

setting.Name: System log enable
setting.Help: Controls if CamX logs are output to the system logging mechanism

setting.Name: Enable Pipeline Flush
setting.Help: Flush a given pipeline in the Session

setting.Name: Log filename
setting.Help: Controls if CamX logs are output to the filename provided (NULL to disable)

setting.Name: Trace group mask
setting.Help: Mask of which traces are enabled

setting.Name: Enable FPS Logs
setting.Help: Enables printing of FPS to logs

setting.Name: Maximum Number of MemSpy Statistics
setting.Help: The maximum number of MemSpy statistics to report

setting.Name: Runtime Report Rate
setting.Help: Controls the printing of the Memspy runtime report every N requests (0 to disable)

setting.Name: Dynamic properties enabled
setting.Help: Properties can be dynamically updated and read per processRequest

setting.Name: Debug Process
setting.Help: Debug settings are only applied to the given process (no process by default)

setting.Name: CSL Mode
setting.Help: Selects run-time CSL mode

setting.Name: Sensor Emulation State
setting.Help: Enables/Disables sensor emulation

setting.Name: External Sensor Module
setting.Help: Enables/Disables external sensor module

setting.Name: Debug exposure settings
setting.Help: Enable setting exposure settings manually to sensor driver for debugging purpose

setting.Name: Exposure Time
setting.Help: Camera exposure time in nanoseconds

setting.Name: Gain
setting.Help: Sensor Gain

setting.Name: Short Exposure Time
setting.Help: Camera short exposure time in nanoseconds

setting.Name: Short Gain
setting.Help: camera sensor short gain

setting.Name: Middle Exposure Time
setting.Help: Camera middle exposure time in nanoseconds

setting.Name: Middle Gain
setting.Help: camera sensor middle gain

setting.Name: Dump Sensor Emulation Data
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of emulated sensor output

setting.Name: Sensor Emulator Application Name
setting.Help: Sensor emulator application name

setting.Name: Sensor Emulator Application Path
setting.Help: Sensor emulator application path

setting.Name: Dual LED Calibration Mode
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Dual LED Calibration or Tuning

setting.Name: Dynamic LED Inline calibration
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dynamic inline LED Calibration

setting.Name: Dynamic LED Inline calibration data max size
setting.Help: max allocated space for dynamic inline LED Calibration data

setting.Name: Dual LED Calibration Data File
setting.Help: Location of the dual LED calibration output file

setting.Name: ADRC Processing
setting.Help: Enables/Disables ADRC

setting.Name: ISO Priority
setting.Help: Enables/Disables ISO Priority

setting.Name: Exposure Time Priority
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Exposure Time Priority

setting.Name: Complete Manual
setting.Help: Complete Manual

setting.Name: Speckle Detection
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Speckle Detection

setting.Name: AF Stats Processing
setting.Help: Enables/Disables AF Stats Processing

setting.Name: AF Algo CHI Overload
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Algo CHI Overload

setting.Name: AWB Stats Processing
setting.Help: Enables/Disables AWB Stats Processing

setting.Name: AWB Algo CHI Overload
setting.Help: Enables/Disables AWB Algo CHI Overload

setting.Name: AFD Stats Processing
setting.Help: Enables/Disables AFD Stats Processing

setting.Name: AFD Algo CHI Overload
setting.Help: Enables/Disables AFD Algo CHI Overload

setting.Name: ASD Stats Processing
setting.Help: Enables/Disables ASD Stats Processing. 0 for enable, 1 for disable

setting.Name: ASD Algo CHI Overload
setting.Help: Enables/Disables ASD Algo CHI Overload

setting.Name: Register Dump Debug Buffer
setting.Help: Whether or not UMD sends a buffer to KMD for resgister dump logging

setting.Name: Register Dump Debug Buffer Size
setting.Help: Size in bytes for each register dump buffer

setting.Name: Register Dump File Name Prefix
setting.Help: Name of the register dump file

setting.Name: IPE Firmware Payload Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of IPE command buffers which represent payload sent to firmware

setting.Name: Systrace Logs Switch
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Systrace Logs

setting.Name: Enable QTimer
setting.Help: Enable/Disable QTimer for SOF timestamps

setting.Name: IFE or CSID TPG Enable State
setting.Help: Enables/Disables IFE or CSID TPG

setting.Name: CSID Binning Enable
setting.Help: Enables/Disables CSID binning

setting.Name: CSID Binning Mode
setting.Help: This setting is valid only if CSID Binning is enable: enableCSIDBinning=TRUE Set binning mode: 0: Bayer Binning mode 1: QCFA Binning mode

setting.Name: CSID Clock Rate in MHz
setting.Help: Overrides driver's calculated CSID clock rate with the provided value. 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable Clock settings from UMD. KMD will set to MAX clock. 0 will disable the override, driver will calculate optimal rate and set it. Any positive value can be used as an override.

setting.Name: Force 3A result metadata to locked
setting.Help: Always returns locked in results, regardless of the actual algo state

setting.Name: Disable UBWC on IFE output links
setting.Help: When enabled, will always use YUV420NV12 on IFE output and follow-up links

setting.Name: Enable UBWCNV124R on IFE FullOut --> IPE link
setting.Help: When enabled, will always use UBWCNV124R (8 bit) on IFE FullOut --> IPE link

setting.Name: Cap resolution for force using single IFE
setting.Help: When enabled, available stream resolution will be cap within single IFE supported range

setting.Name: Single IFE supported width
setting.Help: The max width supported by single IFE

setting.Name: Single IFE supported height
setting.Help: The max height supported by single IFE

setting.Name: Enable Flash Debug
setting.Help: Bypass 3A block so flash always fire base on the captureIntent from application

setting.Name: Dump Sensor EEPROM Data
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of EEPROM data

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump
setting.Help: Dumps output images for all enabled nodes. This will run extremely slow

setting.Name: Input port Dump when output is dumped
setting.Help: Dumps input port when output port is dumped. This will run extremely slow

setting.Name: Auto Input Image Dump Node/Port Mask
setting.Help: Will limit dumps to only the specified nodes when autoInputImageDump is enabled Uses ImageDumpType to define the flags No dumps = 0x0 All input ports for IFE = 0x1 All input ports for IPE = 0x2 All input ports for BPS = 0x4 All JPEG input ports for all JPEG nodes = 0x8 All input ports for FDHw = 0x10 All input ports for LRME = 0x20 All input ports for RANSAC = 0x40 All input ports for all ChiNodes = 0x80 All input ports for CVP = 0x100 All other nodes not explicitly listed above = 0x40000000

setting.Name: IFE Register dump mask
setting.Help: No dumps = 0x0 IFETop = 0x1 ChromaUp = 0x2 Pedestal = 0x4 Linearization = 0x8 BPC = 0x10 HDR = 0x20 ABF = 0x40 LSC = 0x80 ColorCorrect = 0x100 GTM = 0x200 Gamma = 0x400 Stats = 0x800 VidPath = 0x1000 DispPath = 0x2000 FD = 0x4000 PixelRaw = 0x8000 PDAF = 0x10000 PDOUT = 0x20000 LCR = 0x40000 Common = 0x80000

setting.Name: Auto Output Image Dump Node/Port Mask
setting.Help: Will limit dumps to only the specified nodes and ports when autoImageDump is enabled Uses ImageDumpType to define the flags No dumps = 0x0 All output ports for IFE = 0x1 All output ports for IPE = 0x2 All output ports for BPS = 0x4 All JPEG output ports for all JPEG nodes = 0x8 All output ports for FDHw = 0x10 All output ports for LRME = 0x20 All output ports for RANSAC = 0x40 All output ports for all ChiNodes = 0x80 All output ports for CVP = 0x100 All other nodes not explicitly listed above = 0x40000000

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for IFE
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for IFE
Auto Image Dump Output Batch Frames for IFE
setting.Help: Output IFE batched frames(HFR): IFE: Dump only ONE frame from IFE Batch = 0x1 Dump only TWO frames from IFE Batch = 0x2 Dump only THREE frames from IFE Batch = 0x3 Dump only FOUR frames from IFE Batch = 0x4 Dump only FIVE frames from IFE Batch = 0x5 Dump only SIX frames from IFE Batch = 0x6 Dump only SEVEN frames from IFE Batch = 0x7 Dump only EIGHT frames from IFE Batch = 0x8

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for IFE
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for IPE
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for IPE
Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for IPE
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for BPS
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for BPS
setting.Help: Input port mask BPS: BPSInputPort = 0x1;

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for BPS
Auto Image Dump Output port Mask for JpegHw
setting.Help: Output port mask JpegHw: JPEGOutputPort0 = 0x1;

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Input port Mask for JpegHw
setting.Help: Input port mask JpegHw: JPEGInputPort0 = 0x1;

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for JpegHw
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for FDHw
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for FDHw
setting.Help: Input port mask FDHw: FDHwInputPortImage = 0x1

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for FDHw
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for LRME
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for LRME
Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for LRME
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for RANSAC
setting.Help: Output port mask RANSAC: RANSACOutputPort0 = 0x1

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for RANSAC
setting.Help: Input port mask RANSAC: RANSACInputPort0 = 0x1

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for RANSAC
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for all ChiNodes
Auto Image Dump input Port Mask for all ChiNodes
setting.Help: Input port mask ChiNode: ChiNodeInputPort = 0x1

setting.Name: Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for ChiNodes
Auto Image Dump Output Port Mask for CVP
Auto Image Dump Input Port Mask for CVP
Auto Image Dump Instance Mask for CVP
Allow Dynamic Image Dump
setting.Help: Triggers an image dump only when org.codeaurora.qcamera3.hal_private_data.debug_image_dump is TRUE in a request, or if the dynamicImageDumpTrigger property is toggled to TRUE. This Setting must be set to TRUE to enable debug_image_dump, or dynamicImageDumpTrigger to dump images per request.

setting.Name: Dynamic Image Dump Trigger
setting.Help: If dynamicImageDump == TRUE, a set of images per request is dumped when this property is toggled to TRUE. For now, dumps continue until it is reset to FALSE. In the future, this may be a true trigger which resets itself

setting.Name: Watermark Image
setting.Help: Watermark request id onto frame. Only support YUV format

setting.Name: Watermark Offset
setting.Help: Pass the x and y offsets to offset the location of the watermark. Example to offset x position by 40 and y position by 220: 40x220

setting.Name: Reprocess Input Dump
setting.Help: Dumps reprocess input image and metadata

setting.Name: Offline Image Dump Only
setting.Help: Dumps offline processing output images for all enabled nodes. This will run extremely slow

setting.Name: IPE Firmware BL buffer Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of IPE BL buffer which represent debug info from firmware 0x1 = Dump always 0x2 = Dump on error
Enables/Disables dumping of IPE BL buffer which represent debug info from firmware

setting.Name: BPS Firmware BL buffer Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of BPS BL buffer which represent debug info from firmware 0x1 = Dump always 0x2 = Dump on error

setting.Name: IPE Stripe Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of IPE striping debug information 0x1 = Dump always 0x2 = Dump on error

setting.Name: BPS Stripe Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of BPS striping debug information

setting.Name: IPE Scratch buffer Dump
setting.Help: Enables/Disables dumping of IPE Scratch buffer

setting.Name: Force Max FPS
setting.Help: Do not pick a sensor mode above forceMaxFPS. Primarily used for debugging. Set to a huge number to disable

setting.Name: Kick The Machine
setting.Help: If 3A struggles to converge, fake it. Value is the number of requests before forcing convergance

setting.Name: Sensor mode per frame
setting.Help: Update the sensor mode index per frame

setting.Name: Disable PDAF
setting.Help: Completely disable PDAF

setting.Name: Enable T2T
setting.Help: Enable Touch to Track feature

setting.Name: T2T Downscale Ratio
setting.Help: Further downscale ratio from T2T IFE buffer. 1 or 2

setting.Name: T2T CV Operation Mode
setting.Help: T2T SCVE operation mode. 0 through 4

setting.Name: T2T CV Precision Mode
setting.Help: T2T SCVE precision mode. 0 for high 1 for low

setting.Name: T2T confidence threshold
setting.Help: T2T SCVE minimum confidence for object to be considered present. 0-100

setting.Name: default fps
setting.Help: Set the default fps for sensor mode pick

setting.Name: bypassIPEICADependency
setting.Help: Bypass IPE ICA dependency

setting.Name: disableDRQPreemptionOnStopRecord
setting.Help: Disables DRQ preemption on stop record

setting.Name: disableVideoPerfModeSetting
setting.Help: Disables video perf mode setting

setting.Name: Enables offloading sensor acquire call
setting.Help: Enables optimization during sensor acquire by offloading the call

setting.Name: Camera HW version override for testing
setting.Help: Camera HW version override useful for testing purpose

setting.Name: overrideOPPCLOCK
setting.Help: Increase the sensor output pixel clock by x %

setting.Name: Dump Geolib Result
setting.Help: Enable the Geolib result dump in BPS, IPE, EVA(formal CVP)

setting.Name: enable offcenter zoom in geolib
setting.Help: enable offcenter zoom in geolib

setting.Name: Dump CVP ICA input config
setting.Help: Enable the CVP ICA input config dump

setting.Name: TF testing mode
setting.Help: OVERRIDE_FS_TO_A_MAPPING = 1, DISABLE_REFIMEMENT = 2, DISABLE_LMC = 4, TEST_MCTF = 0x7

setting.Name: Enable HJ AF
setting.Help: Enable HJ AF

setting.Name: Disable Spotlight Detection
setting.Help: Disable Spotlight Detection

setting.Name: Spotlight Detection Stats Type
setting.Help: Spotlight Detection Stats Type

setting.Name: Focus Circle for Depth Based Algorithm Switch
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Focus Circle for Depth Based Algorithm

setting.Name: Fallback to Contrast AF for Spotlight Scene
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Fallback to Contrast AF for Spotlight Scene

setting.Name: Log Levels
setting.Help: Set AF log levels [0-7]

setting.Name: Field Of View Compensation Switch
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Field Of View Compensation

setting.Name: Report rate for gyro data
setting.Help: Report rate for gyro data in microsecs

setting.Name: Sampling rate for gyro sensor
setting.Help: Sampling rate for gyro sensor in hertz

setting.Name: Report rate for gravity data
setting.Help: Report rate for gravity data in microsecs

setting.Name: Sampling rate for gravity sensor
setting.Help: Sampling rate for gravity sensor in hertz

setting.Name: Report rate for TOF data
setting.Help: Report rate for TOF data in microsecs

setting.Name: Sampling rate for TOF sensor
setting.Help: Sampling rate for TOF sensor in hertz

setting.Name: Custom TOF sensor default library
setting.Help: TOF sensor default library Update the lib path in DefaultValue section below e.g. /system/lib/sensors.hal.tof.so

setting.Name: MultiWindow PDAF Switch
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Multi-window PDAF

setting.Name: HAF Tuning Switch
setting.Help: Override Tuning Enabled Algorithm, Disabled: No Override, PDAF: Enable only PDAF, TOF: Enable only TOF, DCIAF: Enable only DCIAF, CAF: Enabled only CAF

setting.Name: FullSweep Mode Switch
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Full-sweep Mode Disabled: FullSweep mode is off, InfinityToMacro: FullSweep mode is far to near end, MacroToInfinity: FullSweep mode is near to far end, BothDirection: Fullsweep mode is dual direction

setting.Name: Enable Manual lens control
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Manual Lens Control Disabled: Disable Manual Lens Movement, DAC: Enable Control via DAC, Logical: Enable Control via Logical Position

setting.Name: Define Lens Position
setting.Help: Lens Position Which Interpreted Based on Manual Lens Control

setting.Name: VM debug string
setting.Help: Used to control VM logs for visualizing VM using tool String value for this property should be "ALL" or VM topology names delimited with ',' to enable corresponding topology's VM logs. Default is "" Ex: 1. PDAF: Enables VM logs only under PDAF topology 2. CAF,PDAF: Enables VM logs under CAF and PDAF 3. FD,PDAF,ToF : Enables VM logs for FD, PDAF and ToF topologies 4. ALL : Enable VM logs under all topologies

setting.Name: AF Core Recorder Mode
setting.Help: AF Core Recorder Mode: 0. Diable AF Core Recorder Mode 1. Enable AF Core Recorder Mode 2. Enable AF Core Recorder Mode and Print Set/Input Parameter as well

setting.Name: Enable Lens Sag Compensation
setting.Help: Enable Lens Sag Compensation

setting.Name: Active Node string
setting.Help: Used to create debug probes for active node mask String value for this property should be Active Node names delimited with any delimiter or none to enable corresponding Node logs. Default is "" Ex: 1. PDAF: Create debug probe for PDAF Node 2. TOF: Create debug probe for TOF Node 3. CAF: Create debug probe for CAF Node 4. FOLLOWER: Create debug probe for FOLLOWER Node 5. MAIN: Create debug probe for algo

setting.Name: API Mask
setting.Help: Used to set API mask Ex: 0. Process Monitor 1. Process Search 2. Set Parameters 3. Set Inputs 4. Set Tuning 5. Set Mode 6. Set Camera Mode 7. Set ROI 8. Set Range 9. Get Debug Data 10. Rebase 11. Destroy 12. Set Sensitivity 13. Get Parameters 14. Clear Data

setting.Name: Enable Manual Exposure control
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Manual Exposure Control

setting.Name: Dual BHist support
setting.Help: Enable Dual BHist Support

setting.Name: Disable BG Stat for AF
setting.Help: Disable Reading BG Stats for AF

setting.Name: Enable custom AEC algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom AEC algo

setting.Name: Disbale AF AWB Preflash States
setting.Help: Flag to disable AF and AWB preflash states

setting.Name: YUV formats plane alignment value
setting.Help: This is to update plane align value for internal YUV nodes

setting.Name: Max Frames AF Settle
setting.Help: Max Frames to wait for AF to settle

setting.Name: Max Frames AWB Settle
setting.Help: Max Frames to wait for AWB to settle

setting.Name: Turn on or not preflash over touch AE
setting.Help: Turn on preflash over touch AE in always flash or auto flash mode

setting.Name: Number of frames to skip after flash
setting.Help: Number of frames to skip after flash

setting.Name: Custom AEC Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom AEC Algo library name

setting.Name: Custom AEC Algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom AEC Algo library path

setting.Name: Enable custom AWB algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom AWB algo

setting.Name: Custom AWB Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom AWB Algo library name

setting.Name: Custom AWB Algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom AWB Algo Library path

setting.Name: Enable custom AF algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom AF algo

setting.Name: Custom AF Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom AF Algo library name

setting.Name: Custom AF Algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom AF Algo Library path

setting.Name: Enable custom HAF algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom HAF algo

setting.Name: Custom HAF Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom HAF Algo library name

setting.Name: Custom HAF Algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom HAF Algo Library path

setting.Name: Override HAF Algo Mask
setting.Help: Bit Mask to control which HAF algorithm will be override Bit 0: Override CAF BIT 1: Override PDAF BIT 2: Override TOF BIT 3: Override default mixer BIT 4: Override AF Follower BIT 5: Override PDAF+TOF Mixer

setting.Name: Define Exposure Gain
setting.Help: Value of Exposure Gain

setting.Name: Define Exposure Time
setting.Help: Value of Exposure Time in nanoseconds

setting.Name: Define Lux value
setting.Help: Value of Lux Index

setting.Name: Enable extended timeout for Long Exposure
setting.Help: Enable/Disable extended timeout for Long Exposure

setting.Name: Enable Manual White Balance control
setting.Help: Enable/Disable Manual White Balance Control

setting.Name: Define White Balance Red channel gain
setting.Help: Value of White Balance R Gain

setting.Name: Define White Balance Green channel gain
setting.Help: Value of White Balance G Gain

setting.Name: Define White Balance Blue channel gain
setting.Help: Value of White Balance B Gain

setting.Name: Define White Balance color temperature
setting.Help: Value of White Balance color temperature

setting.Name: Ignore scene mode
setting.Help: If true, InputControlSceneMode is ignored, and scene mode is reported as disabled

setting.Name: Enable custom ASD algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom ASD algo

setting.Name: Custom ASD Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom ASD Algo Library Name

setting.Name: Custom ASD algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom ASD Algo Library Path

setting.Name: Enable custom AFD algo
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom AFD algo

setting.Name: Custom AFD Algo Library Name
setting.Help: Custom AFD Algo Library Name

setting.Name: Custom AFD algo Library Path
setting.Help: Custom AFD Algo Library Path

setting.Name: Enable Dual IFE Mode
setting.Help: Used to control if dual IFE mode is allowed

setting.Name: Force Dual IFE Mode
setting.Help: Forces dual IFE mode on

setting.Name: Dual IFE Manual Split Point Offset From Sensor Center
setting.Help: Overwrites dual IFE split point (offset from sensor horizontal center)

setting.Name: Dual IFE Manual Left Padding
setting.Help: Overwrites dual IFE left padding

setting.Name: Dual IFE Manual Right Padding
setting.Help: Overwrites dual IFE right padding

setting.Name: IFE testgen width config
setting.Help: Overwrites testgen output width

setting.Name: IFE testgen height config
setting.Help: Overwrites testgen output height

setting.Name: Enable OEM Stats Setting
setting.Help: Use the Stats Configuration data provided by OEM

setting.Name: IFE manual 3A CCM override
setting.Help: Disable the support to consume manual 3A CCM update

setting.Name: IFE initial frames to multiply bandwidth
setting.Help: IFE initial frames to multiply bandwidth. Voted bw will be multiplied by 5 for these many frames

setting.Name: PDAF HW enable
setting.Help: Enable PDAF HW enable/disable setting.

setting.Name: Enable Per Frame IFE Register Dump
setting.Help: Enables the Per frame IFE register dump

setting.Name: Enable AB voting based on active IFE output
setting.Help: Enable AB votes computed based on active IFE output dimensions

setting.Name: Dynamic enable/disable mask for IFE blocks
setting.Help: IFE Dynamic Enable Mask: None = 0x0 SWTMC = 0x1 IFEHVX = 0x2 Currently doesn't have enable/disable functionality IFECAMIF = 0x4 IFEPedestalCorrection = 0x8 IFEABF = 0x10 IFELinearization = 0x20 IFEPDPC = 0x40 IFEDemux = 0x80 IFEHDR = 0x100 IFELSC = 0x200 IFEWB = 0x400 Cannot be enabled/disabled since there's no En bit IFEDemosaic = 0x800 IFECC = 0x1000 IFEGTM = 0x2000 IFEGamma = 0x4000 IFECST = 0x8000 ALSC = 0x10000 All Modules = 0xFFFFF

setting.Name: IFE Clock Rate in MHz
setting.Help: Overrides driver's calculated clock rate with the provided value. 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable Clock settings from UMD. KMD will set to MAX clock. 0 will disable the override, driver will calculate optimal rate and set it. Any positive value can be used as an override.

setting.Name: IFE CAMNOC Bandwidth vote in MegaBytes
setting.Help: Overrides driver's calculated CAMNOC BW vote with the provided value. 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable bandwidth settings from UMD. 0 will disable the override, driver will calculate optimal rate and set it. Any positive value can be used as an override. Recommended value is 10640.

setting.Name: IFE external Bandwidth vote in MegaBytes
setting.Help: Overrides driver's calculated non-CAMNOC or external BW vote with the provided value. 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable bandwidth settings from UMD. 0 will disable the override, driver will calculate optimal rate and set it. Any positive value can be used as an override. Recommended value is 10640.

setting.Name: Enable HVX streaming
setting.Help: Used to control HVX streaming

setting.Name: Enable Mask for IPE IQ modules
setting.Help: IPE enable mask: IPEANR = 0x8 IPETF = 0x10 IPECAC = 0x20 IPECST = 0x100 IPELTM = 0x200 IPEColorCorrection = 0x400 IPEGamma = 0x800 IPE2DLUT = 0x1000 IPEChromaEnhancement = 0x2000 IPEChromaSuppression = 0x4000 IPEASF = 0x10000 IPEUpscaler = 0x20000 IPEGrainAdder = 0x40000 IPEHNR = 0x400000 IPELENR = 0x800000 ALLIPEIQModules = 0xFFFFFF To enable/disable IPE IQ modules appropriately, please double check the corresponding IPE IQ module list which depends on platforms under folder src\hwl\isphwsetting\pipeline\ipe

setting.Name: Enable IPE Upscaling
setting.Help: Enable IPE to request a smaller input resolution to upscale

setting.Name: Enable IPE Only Downscaling
setting.Help: Enable IPE to request a certain resolution to downscale

setting.Name: Disable IPE Internal Downscaling
setting.Help: Disable IPE's way to generate downscale ports internally

setting.Name: Enable Dependencies in IPE
setting.Help: Enable Dependencies in IPE to request AAA Stats and IFE Information

setting.Name: IPE IQ enable debug logging
setting.Help: This is to enable the debug log in the IPE IQ module

setting.Name: IPE IQ enable MCTF
setting.Help: This is to enable LRME/Ransac dependancies for MCTF

setting.Name: IPE disable CVP driver
setting.Help: This is to disable CVP driver

setting.Name: Force CVP transform to Unity
setting.Help: This setting helps to forcely override CVP transform

setting.Name: Number of IPE Cores To Use
setting.Help: This is the number of cores the ICP may utilize

setting.Name: Force enable 8bit alignment
setting.Help: Force enable 8bit alignment for UBWC

setting.Name: set LRME/RANSAC transform type
setting.Help: This is to set LRME/RANSAC transform type mask: Regular LRME/Ransac transform = 0x1 HFR interpolation LRME/Ransac transform = 0x2 Unity LRME/Ransac transform = 0x4

setting.Name: IPE ICA grid enablement from chromatix
setting.Help: This is to enable IPE fetch grid from chromatix

setting.Name: MCTF alignment fusion mode
setting.Help: This is to indicate MCTF alignment fusion mode

setting.Name: First frame loopback use input image
setting.Help: This is to indicate that loopback input for first frame is input image

setting.Name: Lens distortion correction feature enablement
setting.Help: enable Lens distortion correction

setting.Name: Debug Data header string
setting.Help: Set header string needed by parser to know the type of debug data

setting.Name: Enable 3A debug-data
setting.Help: General switch to enable 3A debug data. See size settings to set a new size or use default.

setting.Name: AEC debug-data size
setting.Help: Debug-data size reserved for AEC

setting.Name: AWB debug data size
setting.Help: Debug data size reserved for AWB

setting.Name: AF debug data size
setting.Help: Debug data size reserved for AF

setting.Name: Enable Concise 3A debug-data
setting.Help: General switch to enable Concise 3A debug data. See size settings to set a new size or use default.

setting.Name: Concise AEC debug-data size
setting.Help: Debug-data size reserved for Concise AEC

setting.Name: Concise AF debug-data size
setting.Help: Debug-data size reserved for Concise AF

setting.Name: Concise AWB debug-data size
setting.Help: Debug-data size reserved for Concise AWB

setting.Name: Enable Tuning metadata dump
setting.Help: General switch to enable tuning data dump. See size settings to set a new size or use default.

setting.Name: IFE tuning data size
setting.Help: Tuning data reserved for IFE

setting.Name: IPE tuning data size
setting.Help: Tuning data size reserved for IPE.

setting.Name: BPS tuning data size
setting.Help: Tuning data size reserved for BPS

setting.Name: Dump Debug-data on process result
setting.Help: Control debug-data dump per process result If enable this setting and implemented dump by CHI, debug-data including Tuning metadata will be dump into a file on every process result. Note that to dump data, debug-data should be also enable using the corresponding settings. Values: 0: Disable, do not dump any data. 1: Enable for multi-frame snapshot. 2: Enable only while video port is enable. 3: Enable for all processed buffers. This include all preview frames.

setting.Name: Allocate debug-data for offline pipelines
setting.Help: Setting this to TRUE will allocate debug-data for offline sessions. Disabling allocation for offline sessions, reduce memory usage. For usecases where realtime session is available, offline debug-data is not required in the metadata. Deep-copy and allocation takes place already by the framework

setting.Name: PD Library CHI Overload
setting.Help: Enables/Disables Library CHI Overload

setting.Name: Enable custom PD Library
setting.Help: Enable/Disable custom PD Library

setting.Name: Custom PD Library Name
setting.Help: Custom PD library name

setting.Name: Custom PD Library Path
setting.Help: Custom PD Library path

setting.Name: Enable Tintless
setting.Help: Enables tintless algorithm

setting.Name: Enable PD Library Logging
setting.Help: Enable/Disable PD Library Logging 1 - Enable all PDLib general logging 2 - Enable all PDLib general + verbose logging 3 - Enable all PDLib general + verbose logging with Adaptive K logging

setting.Name: Enable PD Library Test Mode
setting.Help: Enable/Disable PD Library Test Mode 1 - General test mode to check gainmap uniformity

setting.Name: Enable PD Library Profiling
setting.Help: Enable/Disable PD Library Profiling

setting.Name: Enable PD Library Data Dump
setting.Help: Enable/Disable PD Library Data Dump 1 - Single raw input with configuration dump. 2 - Raw input dump according to lens position and configuration.

setting.Name: Disable PD Library LCR
setting.Help: Enable/Disable PD Library LCR

setting.Name: EnableIFESWCDM
setting.Help: Enables SW CDM for IFE

setting.Name: Enable AE Scan
setting.Help: Enable/Disable AE Scan 0 Disable 1 Enable AE Scan Time Sweep 2 Enable AE Scan Gain Sweep 4 Enable AE Scan Toogle 8 Enable AE Scan Time Sweep delayed 16 Enable AE Scan Gain Sweep delayed 32 Enable AE Scan Toogle delayed To Enable more then one test case bitwise or the value.

setting.Name: Set Log levels
setting.Help: Bitmask of log levels, bit 0 - error, bit 1 - warning, bit 2 - config, bit 3 - info, bit 4 - dump bit 5 - verbose, bit 6 - log Set bit HIGH to enable Bits 0,1,2,3,4 are enabled by default

setting.Name: Disable ZSL
setting.Help: Do not select a ZSL usecase. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Enable LRME DS2 link
setting.Help: Enable LRME DS2 link. FALSE to disable, TRUE to enable

setting.Name: Enable MFNR
setting.Help: Enable MFNR selection criteria FALSE = 0, TRUE = 1

setting.Name: Select Anchor Selection
setting.Help: Select Anchor Selection Algorithm for MFNR NONE = 0. FIXED = 1, NON-FIXED = 2

setting.Name: Select Anchor Algo Selection
setting.Help: Select Anchor Algorithm Selection Type for MFNR Timestamp = 0. Sharpness = 1, Lighting = 2

setting.Name: Enable Advance Features
setting.Help: Mask to enable Advance Features in AdvancedCameraUsecase No extra features enabled = 0x0 Enable FeatureZSL (by default) = 0x1 Enable FeatureMFNR (HW multi frame) = 0x2 Enable FeatureHDR/AE_Bracket = 0x4 Enable FeatureSWMF (SW multi frame) = 0x8 Enable FeatureMFSR (HW multi frame) = 0x10 Enable FeatureQCFA = 0x20 Enable Feature2 Wrapper = 0x40

setting.Name: Enable offline noise reprocessing
setting.Help: Flag to enable offline noise reprocessing in MFNR Disable = 0, Enable = 1

setting.Name: Enable gamma15 pre-calculation for TMC 1.1
setting.Help: Flag to enable gamma15 pre-calculation for TMC 1.1 Disable = 0, Enable = 1

setting.Name: Force usecase selection
setting.Help: Pass in an ID to force a specific use case to be selected, and bypass the selection logic

setting.Name: Force livesnapshot support
setting.Help: this setting helps to forcely enable liveshot regardless of any target-based mitigations

setting.Name: Force full size livesnapshot
setting.Help: this setting helps to force full size liveshot regardless of any target-based mitigations

setting.Name: Force EIS support
setting.Help: this setting helps to forcely enable EIS regardless of any target-based mitigations

setting.Name: Force FD-rendering-in-UI support
setting.Help: this setting helps to forcely enable FD-rendering-in-UI

setting.Name: Force BurstShot support
setting.Help: this setting helps to forcely enable Burshot

setting.Name: Force sensor mode selection
setting.Help: Pass in an ID to force a specific sensor mode to be selected, and bypass the selection logic

setting.Name: Add FS capability to the sensor
setting.Help: Mark the sensor as FS capable inspite of having no explicit FS mode

setting.Name: Enable GPU Node Rotation Usecase
setting.Help: Select only GPU Node Usecase. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Enable GPU Node Downscale Usecase
setting.Help: Select only GPU Node Usecase. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Force HFR without 3A Usecase selection
setting.Help: Select HFR without 3A Usecase. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Camera close state
setting.Help: Camera close status. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Camera open state
setting.Help: Camera open status. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: PDLib close state
setting.Help: PDLib close status. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: PDLib open state
setting.Help: PDLib open status. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE

setting.Name: Enable EIS V2
setting.Help: Enable EIS V2. 0 for Disable, 1 for Operation Mode match, 2 for force select

setting.Name: Enable EIS V3
setting.Help: Enable EIS V3. 0 for Disable, 1 for Operation Mode match, 2 for force select

setting.Name: EIS V2 Margin
setting.Help: Set EIS V2 Margin

setting.Name: EIS V2 Frame Delay
setting.Help: Set EIS V2 Frame Delay

setting.Name: EIS V3 Margin
setting.Help: Set EIS V3 Margin

setting.Name: EIS V3 Frame Delay
setting.Help: Set EIS V3 Frame Delay

setting.Name: Number of PCRs before stream on
setting.Help: Set number of PCRs to handle before stream on

setting.Name: Max Image Buffer Timeout Count
setting.Help: How many times to wait for an image buffer to be free when all are busy. Effective wait time = imageBufferWaitTime*MaxImageBufferTimeoutCount.

setting.Name: Image Buffer Wait Time
setting.Help: How long to wait for an image buffer to be free when all are busy in milliseconds.

setting.Name: Maximum image buffer allocation count override for real time nodes
setting.Help: Maximum number of Image Buffers to allocate for real time nodes 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable the maximum image buffer count override Any positive value can be used as an override.

setting.Name: Maximum image buffer allocation count override for non-real time nodes
setting.Help: Maximum number of Image Buffers to allocate for non-real time nodes 0xffffffff (-1) will completely disable the maximum image buffer count override Any positive value can be used as an override.

setting.Name: Stats Frame Skipping
setting.Help: Factor to skip stats processing. e.g. 0: invalid. 1: No Skip. 2: skip 1 frame. 3: skip 2 frames

setting.Name: Non HFR mode FPS bound
setting.Help: Maximum fps bound exposed in capability to App in Non HFR mode

setting.Name: Min FPS bound for frame duration
setting.Help: Minimum fps bound of frame duration for max resolution

setting.Name: Enable OIS Optimization
setting.Help: Enable OIS Optimization

setting.Name: Enable Sensor Handle Caching
setting.Help: Enable Sensor Handle Caching

setting.Name: Force Enable Debug Mode QCFA with SW Remosaic
setting.Help: Force Enable QuadCFA and SW Remosaic in Sensor Capability for Debug/Test purposes only

setting.Name: Enable CHI Partial Data
setting.Help: Enable Partial Data Support from CHI: CHIPartialDataDisable for no CHI Partial Data, CHIPartialDataSeparate to send CHI Partial Data independently, CHIPartialDataCombined to send it along with Core Driver.

setting.Name: Enable CHI Partial Data Recovery
setting.Help: Enable Partial Data Recovery

setting.Name: Enable per-frame metadata dump
setting.Help: 0 - disable: 1 - Enable text metadata dump for offline pipelines, 2 - Enable text metadata dump for real-time pipelines, 3 - Enable text metadata dump for both offline and real-time pipelines 4 - Enable binary metadata dump for offline pipelines, 8 - Enable binary metadata dump for real-time pipelines, 12 - Enable binary metadata dump for both offline and real-time pipelines

setting.Name: Enable metadata dumps
setting.Help: Enable proving memset data to the nodes when input data for tag ID is NULL. 0 - disable, 1 - only properties, 2 - all tags.

setting.Name: Enable linear LUT for metadata
setting.Help: Enable linear LUT for metadata operations

setting.Name: Enable FD Stream in Real Time
setting.Help: Enable FD Stream in Real Time from CHI: FALSE = 0, TRUE = 1

setting.Name: Select In-Sensor HDR 3 Exposure usecase
setting.Help: Select in-Sensor HDR 3 Exposure usecase and sensor mode: 0x0 = None 0x1 = Preview 0x2 = Seamless snapshot 0x10 = Force enable seamless snapshot (for debug usage only and please make sure current sensor is supported)

setting.Name: Enable Unified Buffer Manager
setting.Help: Enable this setting so that CHI and CAMX use the unified image buffer manager. 0 for FALSE, i.e CHIBufferManager uses Gralloc interface to allocate Buffers 1 for TRUE, i.e CHIBufferManager uses CamXBufferManager interface to allocate Buffers

setting.Name: Enable/Disable late binding of buffer to ImageBuffer holder for CHI buffer managers
setting.Help: Whether to enable late bind of memory/buffers to ImageBuffer for CHI buffer managers. 0 for FALSE, i.e Buffers are allocated/bound at the time of GetImageBufferInfo 1 for TRUE, i.e holder ImageBuffer objects are returned in GetImageBufferInfo

setting.Name: Enable feature2 dump
setting.Help: Flag to enable raw image and/or metadata dump in feature2. Disable = 0, Enable = 1

setting.Name: Force fixed number of frames for HWMF
setting.Help: Integer to force HWMF fixed number of frames Disable = 0, Enable and num of frames > 0

setting.Name: Force fixed number of frames for SWMF
setting.Help: Integer to force SWMF fixed number of frames Disable = 0, Enable and num of frames > 0

setting.Name: Enable CHITargetBufferManager CHI Fence Support
setting.Help: Enable this setting so that CHI fence support is enabled on CHITargetBufferManager class. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE.

setting.Name: Enable CHITargetBufferManager CHI Fence Support for MFSR only
setting.Help: Enable this setting so that CHI fence support is enabled on MFSR CHITargetBufferManager. 0 for FALSE, 1 for TRUE.

setting.Name: Enable RAW HDR Snapshot
setting.Help: Enable/Disable RAW HDR Snapshot by set this value. 0 for FALSE, Disable 1 for TRUE, Enable

setting.Name: FD Processing Control
setting.Help: Override to control FD processing, ForceDisable: Force disable FD processing eventhough App requests for processing. Android tests will fail ForceEnable: Force enbale FD processing eventhough App doesn't enable FD. Android tests still pass AppRequest: Enable/Disable based on App request. Android tests pass

setting.Name: FD Manager Enable Threading
setting.Help: Enable/Disable FD Manager threading

setting.Name: FD base resolution
setting.Help: Select one of the following base resolutions 640x480, 854x480, 320x240, 427x240

setting.Name: FD Config source
setting.Help: Override to control source for FD configuration, Default: Default config populated by driver VendorTag: Config fetched from vendor tag Binary: Config fetched from tuning binary

setting.Name: FD Multi Cam Processing type
setting.Help: Criteria to select which camera to run when both running, ProcessMasterOnly: Process only master requests at full fps ProcessAuxOnly: Process only aux requests at full fps ProcessBoth: Process both master and aux at half fps

setting.Name: Whether to use FPS based or alternate frame skip
setting.Help: FD frame skip

setting.Name: Whether to use device orienation for FD improvement
setting.Help: Use device orienation to improve FD

setting.Name: Whether to get accelerometer info from vendor tag
setting.Help: Get Accelerometer info using vendor tag

setting.Name: Vendor Tag section for Accelerometer information
setting.Help: Vendor tag to read accelerometer information

setting.Name: Vendor Tag name for Accelerometer information
setting.Help: Vendor tag to read accelerometer information

setting.Name: FD Filter engine source
setting.Help: Override to control FD engine filter, FD_Standard_ARM: Use FD_Standard_ARM as FD filter FD_Standard_DSP: Use FD_Standard_DSP as FD filter FD_DL_ARM: Use FD_DL_ARM as FD filter FD_DL_DSP: Use FD_DL_DSP as FD filter FD_DL_DSP_and_Standard_ARM: Use FD_DL_DSP and supplement with FD_Standard_ARM when certain conditions are met

setting.Name: FD Client Type source
setting.Help: Override to control FD engine filter, FDHWHybrid: Use FD Hybrid as clinet type FDSWOnly : Use FD SW only as client type FDDLDSP : Use FD DL as client type

setting.Name: Disable Posting FD results
setting.Help: Enable/Disable posting FD results to metadata, property

setting.Name: Enable Offline processing of FD
setting.Help: Enable/Disable offline FD processing

setting.Name: Optimize Result Metadata
setting.Help: Enable/Disable framework metadata optimization

setting.Name: Use Different tuning for front camera for FD processing
setting.Help: Enable/Disable different tuning for front camera for processing

setting.Name: Use Internal buffers for FD processing
setting.Help: Enable/Disable using internal buffers and copy frames for processing

setting.Name: Use UseCase Pool for FD data
setting.Help: Use UseCase Pool for FD data

setting.Name: Fast FD Metadata
setting.Help: Determine when the FD metadata is returned TRUE - Return metadata after IFE completes hw submission FALSE - Defer to the point when buffers return for the request

setting.Name: Minimum req id for FD dependency
setting.Help: Can't set dependency on for FD on req id lesser than 5

setting.Name: Enable Preprocessing of FD input frame
setting.Help: To improve FD detection rate, preprocess the frame Disable : Disable any pre processing. For all other options, whether pre-processing is really done or not depends on few other factors based on scene. AdaptiveGTM : Enable Adaptive Global Tone Map GTM : Enable Global Tone Map LTM : Enable Local Tone Map

setting.Name: Whether to enable preprocessing always
setting.Help: Valid only if FDPreprocessing is not Disable TRUE - Enable preprocessing on all requests FALSE - Selectively enable preprocessing, exa - enable only on low light scenes

setting.Name: Whether to enable dumping of frames before and after preprocessing
setting.Help: Dump input and output frames of preprocessing and profile processing time TRUE - Enable frame dumping, profiling FALSE - Disable

setting.Name: Switch of App UI facial attribute settings
setting.Help: Whether to accept App UI settings of facial atttibutes detection or not Valid only when FD is enabled TRUE - Accept App UI settings FALSE - Ignore App UI settings

setting.Name: Switch of facial parts detection
setting.Help: Enable/Disable facial parts detection (AKA sparse landmark or landmark) Valid only when FD is enabled TRUE - Enable facial parts detection FALSE - Disable

setting.Name: Switch of smile detection
setting.Help: Enable/Disable smile detection Valid only when FD and facial parts detection are enabled TRUE - Enable smile detection FALSE - Disable

setting.Name: Switch of gaze and blink detection
setting.Help: Enable/Disable gaze and blink detection Valid only when FD and facial parts detection are enabled TRUE - Enable gaze and blink detection FALSE - Disable

setting.Name: Switch of facial contour detection
setting.Help: Enable/Disable facial contour detection (AKA dense landmark) Valid only when FD and facial parts detection are enabled TRUE - Enable facial contour detection FALSE - Disable

setting.Name: Allocation of FD worker thread tasks
setting.Help: Allocation of facial attributes detection tasks between FD worker threads Valid only when FD and FD Manager threading are enabled PTDOnPriThread - Run facial parts detection on the primary worker thread PTDOnSecThread - Run facial parts detection on the secondary worker thread

setting.Name: JPEG EXIF Enable App2
setting.Help: Enable/Disable JPEG EXIF App2

setting.Name: Expose Full Size for Quad CFA Sensor
setting.Help: Expose Full Size for Quad CFA Sensor

setting.Name: Use Feature Model for Quad CFA Sensor
setting.Help: Use Feature Model for Quad CFA Sensor

setting.Name: AEC Gain Threshold for Quad CFA Feature
setting.Help: AEC Gain Threshold for Quad CFA Feature

setting.Name: Flash control
setting.Help: Disables Flash

setting.Name: SOF Watchdog Recovery
setting.Help: Induce recovery if continuous invalid SOF occurs and hits set threshold

setting.Name: Default Node Response Time
setting.Help: The time a node needs to process a request in Milliseconds. Used when taking the maximum time a pipeline is expected to be done.

setting.Name: Session Response Padding Time
setting.Help: The padding time in milliseconds added to the maximum time reported by pipelines. Used by flush to let pipelines have some room to inject results and do other processing besides the request processing.

setting.Name: Max Flush Wait Time
setting.Help: The maximum amount of time flush should wait for regardless of what the maximum node reported is.

setting.Name: Flush Fallback Wait Time
setting.Help: The time flush will wait after it has timed out (Do not factor this in with max flush wait time).

setting.Name: feature1
setting.Help: set tuning feature1 None = 0, ISPHDR = 1, ADRC = 2, InSensorHDR3Exp = 3

setting.Name: feature2
setting.Help: set tuning feature2 None = 0, OISCapture = 1, HLG = 2, HDR10 = 3, MFNRBlend = 4, MFNRPostFilter = 5, MFSRBlend = 6, MFSRPostFilter = 7

setting.Name: RaiseSigabrt
setting.Help: Raise sigabrt for debug builds to track critical failures

setting.Name: RaiseRecoverySigabrt
setting.Help: Raise recovery sigabrt for debug builds to track critical failures

setting.Name: EnableRecovery
setting.Help: Enable Recovery

setting.Name: EnableSignal35Tombstone
setting.Help: Enable Signal 35 Tombstone without process crash for Callstacks

setting.Name: EnableAsciiLogging
setting.Help: Set offline ASCII Logging Disable = 0, Enable = 1 Note: The setting is independent from binary logger setting. It does not effect binary logging

setting.Name: EnableBinaryLog
setting.Help: Set offline binary Logging. Disable = 0, Enable = 1 Note: The setting is independent from ASCII logging setting. It does not effect ASCII logging.

setting.Name: OfflineLoggerMinFlushCnt
setting.Help: Offline Log minium flush count

setting.Name: EnableFenceDrop
setting.Help: Enable Inducer Flag

setting.Name: InducerIsRealTime
setting.Help: Trigger inducer in realtime system

setting.Name: InducerPipelineName
setting.Help: Which pipeline need to be trigger by inducer

setting.Name: InducerNodeName
setting.Help: Which node need to be trigger by inducer

setting.Name: InducerRequestId
setting.Help: Greater than the reqId wiil trigger inducer

setting.Name: InducerPortId
setting.Help: Which port need to be trigger by inducer

setting.Name: InducerFenceMarkError
setting.Help: Fence will be mark as error by inducer

settingsSubGroup.Name: Session dump to log if in error state

setting.Name: SessionDumpForFlush
setting.Help: Dumps session info if in error state at Flush

settingsSubGroup.Name: Session dump to log if in error state

setting.Name: SessionDumpToLog
setting.Help: Dumps session to logcat if in error state

settingsSubGroup.Name: Session dump to file if in error state

setting.Name: SessionDumpToFile
setting.Help: Dumps session to file if in error state

settingsSubGroup.Name: Session dump to log if reset recovery triggered

setting.Name: SessionDumpForRecovery
setting.Help: Dumps session to logcat if in recovery state

setting.Name: DumpNodeProcessingInfo
setting.Help: Dumps basic stats about node processing time to logcat

setting.Name: DumpSessionProcessingInfo
setting.Help: Dumps basic stats about session request processing time to logcat

setting.Name: Number Of CHI Threads
setting.Help: Allows to configure the number of CHI Threads to be used

setting.Name: UseVFETPG
setting.Help: Use VFE_TPG: Valid for presil test modes (CSIM against RUMI)

setting.Name: IFE Buf-done timeout
setting.Help: IFE Buf-done fence wait timeout in millisecond

setting.Name: IFE input width
setting.Help: IFE input width in pixel

setting.Name: IFE input height
setting.Help: IFE input height in pixel

setting.Name: IPE Buf-done timeout
setting.Help: IPE Buf-done fence wait timeout in millisecond

setting.Name: IPE number of iteration for Unit test bypassing IQ blocks
setting.Help: A setting to IPE IQ bypass unit test to specify number of iterations to run.

setting.Name: Enable/Disable late binding of buffer to ImageBuffer holder
setting.Help: Wheter to enable late bind of memory/buffers to ImageBuffer

setting.Name: Use Mem Pool Manager for Memory allocations
setting.Help: Whether to use Memory Pool Manager for image buffer allocations

setting.Name: Validate Mem Pool Group in list
setting.Help: Verifies whether input MemPoolGroup handle exists in the list

setting.Name: Do not group Buffer Managers
setting.Help: Each Buffer manager will have its own group, no sharing of buffers among Buffer Managers

setting.Name: Minimum number of Buffers to have in Free list always
setting.Help: These many buffer will always be there in free list of a specific group

setting.Name: Allocate buffers on Buffer Manager Register
setting.Help: Allocates buffers at the time of register

setting.Name: Group Buffer managers with exact device match
setting.Help: Share buffers among Buffer Managers having exact list of devices to map. Valid only if MPMDoNotGroupBufferManagers is FALSE If Grouping and MPMGroupIfExactDeviceMatch is enabled : Buffer managers will share buffers only if the Buffer Managers needs buffers that needs to be mapped to exact same devices. If Grouping is enabled and MPMGroupIfExactDeviceMatch is disabled : Device list is not considered to decide whether Buffer Managers can share buffers. Buffers will be mapped to all devices that are required by both the Buffer Managers.

setting.Name: Min Buffer size in bytes for sharing
setting.Help: Buffer Managers with size less than this value will have dedicated groups, i.e no sharing

setting.Name: Max size (in bytes) difference allowed while matching buffer managers' required size
setting.Help: Buffer Managers are attached to same Group if buffer size difference (in bytes) is within this range

setting.Name: Threshold of buffer (in bytes) to override MPMSizeDiffAllowedToGroup to have different grouping rule
setting.Help: Groups above this defined size will use MPMSizeDiffAllowedToGroupOverride to define difference allowed when matching buffer managers' required size

setting.Name: Max override size (in bytes) difference allowed while matching buffer managers' required size
setting.Help: This byte range is used when a group size is larger than the defined large group size (MPMLargeGroupSizeDefinition) to determine if buffer managers should have a different group

setting.Name: Buffer address alignment
setting.Help: Address alignment with which all buffers are allocated, valid only for CSL allocations

setting.Name: Force CHI Buffer Managers to use one of the buffer heaps
setting.Help: Force to use CHI Buffer Managers to use a specified heap if bufferHeap field is not explicitly set in CHIBufferManagerCreateData. 0 - System 1 - Ion 2 - DSP 3 - EGL (Gralloc)

setting.Name: Self tune immediate count
setting.Help: When enabled, immediate count configured in Buffer Manager create data is ignored and self tuned based on different link properties (node type, real time/offline pipeline, etc)

setting.Name: Enable/Disable MPM monitor thread
setting.Help: Whether to enable Memory Pool Manager monitor thread

setting.Name: MPM monitor thread time interval
setting.Help: The time interval (in milliseconds) of MPM monitor thread that wakes up periodically to perform certain tasks

setting.Name: MPM monitor thread self-shrinking buffer size limit
setting.Help: The advantages we get with self shrinking on small buffers may be less than the costs of allocating those buffers again when needed. Hence MPM monitor thread won't free up idle buffers of sizes less than this pre-defined size in bytes.

setting.Name: Enable/Disable MPM state logging
setting.Help: Whether to enable more debug logging printing state of Buffers, Buffer Managers, Groups at different stages of their lifecycle.

setting.Name: Enable Memory statistics profiling
setting.Help: When enabled, memory statistics are tracked and printed for CmdBuffers, Memory Pool Manager

setting.Name: Minimum buffer size to free immediately on deactivate
setting.Help: If the buffer size in the current group is more than this threshold, we free the buffers immediately on Deactivate, keeping max 1 buffer in free list for any immediate usage. Current value 50MB

setting.Name: Validate ImageBuffer state for client usage
setting.Help: Check whether ImageBuffer object is in a state where clients can access it legally

setting.Name: Size Threshold to disable Delayed Unmap feature
setting.Help: Disable Delayed Unamp feature while mapping to SMMU for buffers of size more than this threshold. Current threshold is 35MB

setting.Name: Force Disable Delayed Unmap optimization
setting.Help: Disable Delayed Unamp feature while mapping to SMMU for all buffers

setting.Name: Size Threshold to delay mapping of Gralloc buffer
setting.Help: Size threshold above which a gralloc buffer may be delayed to be mapped to smmu. Delay mapping depends on few other condition apart from size threshold. Default value of 35MB allows upto 4K resolution buffers to be mapped immediately (not delayed map)

setting.Name: Dump AF output to logs
setting.Help: Mask info: dump AF Stats: 0x1 dump AF Info: 0x2 dump AF HWPD Config: 0x4 dump Stats, Info and HWPD config: 0x7

setting.Name: Dump AEC output to logs
setting.Help: Mask info: dump AEC Stats: 0x1 dump AEC Info: 0x2 dump AEC HAL Data: 0x4 dump Stats, Info and HAL Data: 0x7

setting.Name: Dump AWB output to logs
setting.Help: Mask info: dump AWB Stats: 0x1 dump AWB Info: 0x2 dump AWB HAL Data: 0x4 dump Stats, Info and HAL Data: 0x7

setting.Name: Dump AFD row sum stats to bin
setting.Help: If flag is enabled then row sum stats will be dumped into mobile device. To enable/disable dump, use below flag values. TRUE: Enable dump FALSE: Disable dump

setting.Name: profile3A
setting.Help: Bit mask for profiling Bit 0: AEC module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 1: AWB module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 2: AFD module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 3: ASD module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 4: AF module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 5: PDLIB module (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 24: Camera ID based profiling (Range- 0:Disable,1:Enable) Bit 25 - 28: Camera ID (Range- 0-15) Bit 31: Time/Trace (Range- 0:Time,1:Trace) To enable multiple modules, set corresponding bits.
